diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Fungal prosthetic mitral valve endocarditis caused by Scopulariopsis species
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis was supported by the patient's clinical presentation of fever and leg pain, negative blood cultures, and the identification of Scopulariopsis species in fungal cultures from embolectomy tissue. A transesophageal echocardiogram revealed vegetation on the mitral valve, further confirming endocarditis.
